Tributes for former Napier city councillor Mark Herbert https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/tributes-for-former-napier-city-councillor-mark-herbert/RXJESQ53L5BTTA2FZJ6RXBIICA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/tributes-for-former-napier-city-councillor-mark-herbert/RXJESQ53L5BTTA2FZJ6RXBIICA/ Doug LaingMark Herbert was a Napier city councillor from 1998 to 2016. Sat, 27 Apr 2024 08:04:22 +0000 Mark Herbert at the Napier City Council table in 2016, the last of his 18 years on the council. Photo / NZME.
Radical new cancer vaccine could be a game-changer for melanoma patients https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/radical-new-cancer-vaccine-could-be-a-game-changer-for-melanoma-病人/B5JDCZVN2FCPHPXGM5O5IDJPWA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/radical-new-cancer-vaccine-could-be-a-game-changer-for-melanoma-病人/B5JDCZVN2FCPHPXGM5O5IDJPWA/ The vaccine was created using the same technology used to create the Covid-19 vaccine. Sat, 27 Apr 2024 07:38:38 +0000 New Zealand is among the countries where a new cancer vaccine is being trialled on patients with melanoma.
Police praise teenagers lost in Southland bush https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-praise-teenagers-lost-in-southland-bush/56BQBEJADVHDXM34SCLF64RAUE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-praise-teenagers-lost-in-southland-bush/56BQBEJADVHDXM34SCLF64RAUE/ Southland teenagers who had to be rescued after getting lost in the bush overnight. Sat, 27 Apr 2024 07:00:56 +0000 The five boys had set out on a day walk on the Makarewa Falls track in the Hokonui Hills but lost their way when the light faded.
Social media posts of luxury Mercedes-Benz on Auckland beach with ‘clown mask’ driver leads to arrest of Head Hunter https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/social-media-posts-of-luxury-mercedes-benz-on-auckland-beach-with-clown-mask-driver-leads-to-arrest-of-猎头/3UOS7POXWZBE5NT7L3LTSIM3H4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/social-media-posts-of-luxury-mercedes-benz-on-auckland-beach-with-clown-mask-driver-leads-to-arrest-of-猎头/3UOS7POXWZBE5NT7L3LTSIM3H4/ Jared SavageBut the gang member has hit back online to claim that he wasn't wearing the clown mask. Sat, 27 Apr 2024 06:57:56 +0000 The patched member of the Head Hunters gang often posts content online of a clown character interacting with police, but denies wearing the mask while driving on Muriwai Beach in April 2024. Photo / Instagram Photo / NZ Police
Israel-Hamas war: Sadness for Kiwi family after premature Palestinian baby Sabreen Jouda dies https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/israel-hamas-war-sadness-for-kiwi-family-after-premature-palestinian-baby-sabreen-jouda-dies/72LLZDCGE5FOFNUKHQAFZEELIU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/israel-hamas-war-sadness-for-kiwi-family-after-premature-palestinian-baby-sabreen-jouda-dies/72LLZDCGE5FOFNUKHQAFZEELIU/ Baby Sabreen loses fight for survival after being cut from dead mother’s womb. Sat, 27 Apr 2024 05:27:30 +0000 Sabreen Jouda, who was delivered prematurely after her mother was killed in an Israeli strike along with her husband and daughter, has lost her fight for life aged 5 days. She's pictured in an incubator in the Emirati hospital in Rafah, southern Gaza Strip aged 1 day. AP Photo/Mohammad Jahjouh
Child dies after crash in driveway in Karaka, Auckland https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/child-dies-after-crash-on-driveway-in-karaka-auckland/WF7XGZ3K7VEU3DOU65RALJWLSU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/child-dies-after-crash-on-driveway-in-karaka-auckland/WF7XGZ3K7VEU3DOU65RALJWLSU/ A section of the road is closed and enquiries are underway.
